data.set_prompt: Prompt used to set state or attributes on entities.
data.command_prompt: Prompt used to identify and execute scripts.
data.help_prompt: Prompt used to get help on how to use the smart home, ask what scripts are available, etc.
data.max_tokens: Maximum tokens to return in response
